00022 #pragma once

00024 #include <thrust/detail/config.h>
00025 #include <thrust/device_ptr.h>
00026 #include <thrust/device_reference.h>
00027 #include <thrust/device_new.h>
00028 #include <thrust/device_delete.h>
00029 #include <limits>
00030 #include <stdexcept>
00031 
00032 namespace thrust
00033 {
00034 
00048 template<typename T>
00049   class device_new_allocator
00050 {
00051   public:
00053     typedef T                                 value_type;
00054 
00056     typedef device_ptr<T>                     pointer;
00057 
00059     typedef device_ptr<const T>               const_pointer;
00060 
00062     typedef device_reference<T>               reference;
00063 
00065     typedef device_reference<const T>         const_reference;
00066 
00068     typedef std::size_t                       size_type;
00069 
00071     typedef typename pointer::difference_type difference_type;
00072 
00078     template<typename U>
00079       struct rebind
00080     {
00083       typedef device_new_allocator<U> other;
00084     }; // end rebind
00085 
00087     __host__ __device__
00088     inline device_new_allocator() {}
00089 
00091     __host__ __device__
00092     inline ~device_new_allocator() {}
00093 
00095     __host__ __device__
00096     inline device_new_allocator(device_new_allocator const&) {}
00097 
00099     template<typename U>
00100     __host__ __device__
00101     inline device_new_allocator(device_new_allocator<U> const&) {}
00102 
00106     __host__ __device__
00107     inline pointer address(reference r) { return &r; }
00108     
00112     __host__ __device__
00113     inline const_pointer address(const_reference r) { return &r; }
00114 
00120     __host__
00121     inline pointer allocate(size_type cnt,
00122                             const_pointer = const_pointer(static_cast<T*>(0)))
00123     {
00124       if(cnt > this->max_size())
00125       {
00126         throw std::bad_alloc();
00127       } // end if
00128 
00129       // use "::operator new" rather than keyword new
00130       return pointer(device_new<T>(cnt));
00131     } // end allocate()
00132 
00139     __host__
00140     inline void deallocate(pointer p, size_type cnt)
00141     {
00142       // use "::operator delete" rather than keyword delete
00143       device_delete(p);
00144     } // end deallocate()
00145 
00149     __host__ __device__
00150     inline size_type max_size() const
00151     {
00152       return std::numeric_limits<size_type>::max THRUST_PREVENT_MACRO_SUBSTITUTION () / sizeof(T);
00153     } // end max_size()
00154 
00158     __host__ __device__
00159     inline bool operator==(device_new_allocator const&) { return true; }
00160 
00164     __host__ __device__
00165     inline bool operator!=(device_new_allocator const &a) {return !operator==(a); }
00166 }; // end device_new_allocator

00171 } // end thrust
